challenge.title: Step 6
challenge.description: If the square_target is equal to 1, declare a variable root and assign it the value 1 . Also, print the message 'The square root of {square_target} is 1'. Remember to format the message using an f-string.

tests.text: You should assign the value 1 to the root variable and print the message 'The square root of {square_target} is 1' inside the if body.
